import React, {Component} from 'react' class EditOwner extends Component { state = { name: '', surname: '', id: '', phone: '', adress: '', city: '', email: '', password: '', passwordConfirmation: '', error: null } handleOnChange = ({ target: { name, value } }) => this.setState({ [name]: value }) handleEditSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault() const { state: { name, surname, id, phone, adress, city, email, password, passwordConfirmation }, props: { onEditProfile } } = this const user= JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('user')) this.setState({ name: name || user.name, surname: surname || user.surname, }, () => { const { state: { name, surname, id, phone, adress, city, email, password, passwordConfirmation }} = this let data={name, surname, id, phone, adress, city, email, password, passwordConfirmation} onEditProfile(data) }) } render(){ return

Owner's details:

{this.state.error &&

{this.state.error}

} {this.state.isRegister &&

You have successfully registered!

}
} } export default EditOwner
